channel.title: Superheat item

item.title: Superheat item
item.dc:creator: @pickle_boy4 pickle boy4
item.description:
@pickle_boy4 wrote:

Im on a 317 and i want to add superheat item for making bars, i want it to give smithing and magic xp but im new to this stuff
i know i would put the spell in playerAssistant and the code would like something like
case 1178: // high alch
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.alchDelay > 2000) {
if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemId, slot, 1)){
if(!c.getCombat().checkMagicReqs(50)) {
break;
}
if(itemId == 995) {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t alch coins.”);
break;
}
if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemId, slot, 1)){
c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(995, (int)(c.getShops().getItemShopValue(itemId)*.75));
c.startAnimation(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[50][2]);
c.gfx100(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[50][3]);
c.alchDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
sendFrame106(6);
addSkillXP(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[50][7] * Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE, 6);
refreshSkill(6);
}
}
}
break;

But i don’t know what the case is for superheat item and how i would code that in, can some one help me out??

Read full topic
